summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 8th Avenue Northwest, as established by Ordinance No. 53674 and amending Ordinances, from Leary Way to West 70th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 10303 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
